title: Inception
plot_synopsis: Inception follows the story of Dom Cobb, a skilled thief who specializes in the art of extraction: stealing valuable secrets from deep within the subconscious during the dream state. Cobb is offered a chance at redemption if he can plant an idea into the mind of a CEO by infiltrating his dreams. As Cobb and his team navigate through multiple layers of dreams within dreams, they face unexpected challenges and uncover dark secrets.
